data.name: Bank with activity of savings and current account is a small specialist bank
Bank with the activity of savings and not current account is not a small specialist bank.
Bank with the activity of lending to small enterprises is a small specialist bank.
Bank with the activity of lending to medium enterprises is a small specialist bank.
Bank with the activity of lending to large enterprises is not a small specialist bank.
Bank with the activity of lending which is secured by mortgages on residential property is a small specialist bank.
Bank with the activity of lending which is secured by mortgages on commercial property is not a small specialist bank.
Bank with the activity of lending which is secured by mortgages on a security is not a small specialist bank.
A small specialist bank with a capital resource of 1000000 meets the base capital resource requirement.
A small specialist bank with a capital resource of 499999 meets the base capital resource requirement (supervisory trigger?)
